11 Linear Regression How to perform a linear regression in jamovi: You need two continuous variables (one predictor and one dependent variable). Make sure that the measurement levels are set8 so that both variables are marked with . A correct setup should look similar to this: Select Analyses -> Regression -> Linear Regression. Drag and drop your outcome variable to Dependent Variable and your predictor to Covariates. The result is shown in the right panel: This is demonstrated in section 2.â†©
